snippet: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau will examine and make rules covering about 30 credit reporting companies, including the big three - Equifax, Experian and TransUnion.
abstract: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau will examine and make rules covering about 30 credit reporting companies, including the big three - Equifax, Experian and TransUnion.

headline.main: U.S. Consumer Watchdog to Oversee Credit Bureaus
headline.print_headline: U.S. Consumer Bureau to Oversee Companies That Handle Credit Reports
